member.name: IUIAnimationLoopIterationChangeHandler2.OnLoopIterationChanged
member.summary: Handles loop iteration change events, which occur when a loop within a storyboard begins a new iteration.
member.param: The storyboard to which the loop belongs.
The iteration count for the latest .
The iteration count for the previous .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationLoopIterationChangeHandler2
member.summary: Defines a method for handling storyboard loop iteration events.
